long_description: The Atacma Pack from Patagonia is a 2-compartment wet/dry daypack. It has exterior compression straps that carry a skateboard and an interior, padded laptop compartment. Generous main compartment with dump pockets for on-the-go organization; internal organization has plenty of options for electronics and daily supplies, including a key lanyard. Main compartment has ample room for a change of clothes, lunch and more. Padded computer sleeve is raised off the ground for impact protection; sleeve secures with a buckle closure and doubles as an insulated hydration pocket with tube port. Outer pocket with drain holes holds a damp wetsuit, drippy waders or a pair odorous climbing shoes; waterproof barrier separates it from the main compartment. External webbing straps take on a skateboard or bulky clothing; 2 stretch side pockets keep water bottles handy. Airflow mesh on the shoulder straps and back panel prevent overheating, compression straps stabilize the load and the sternum strap has a built-in emergency whistle. All fabrics are treated with a Deluge(R) Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Patagonia Atacama daypack includes a top-mounted, reinforced haul handle.
short_description: The Atacma Pack from Patagonia is a 2-compartment wet/dry daypack. It has exterior compression straps that carry a skateboard and an interior, padded laptop compartment.
